title: Chapters
description:
Chapters JSON Schema

This implemented a json schema from the podcastindex.org chapters proposal

See https://github.com/Podcastindex-org/podcast-namespace/blob/main/chapters/jsonChapters.md

version.description: The version number of the format being used

properties.description: An array of chapter objects defined below

author.description: The name of the author of this podcast episode.

title.description: The title of this podcast episode.

podcastName.description: The name of the podcast this episode belongs to.

fileName.description: The name of the audio file these chapters apply to.

waypoints.description: If this property is present, the locations in a chapter object should be displayed with a route between locations.
